thread.section_title: Optima Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optima Tax Relief | optimataxrelief.com
thread.title: Bobbie Pullig
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Bobbie Pullig

author: Bobbie Pullig
title: Bobbie Pullig
text: After a negative review Optima contacted me to remove my review if management would contact to talk about refunding me some of my $6000.00 that i wasted on their services which i got nothing at all in return. I gladly agreed. I wasn't able to find my review so i called Optima back and they told me they would send me the link to remove it. I received NOTHING from them or no phone call !!!
